channel.title: In game player profiles
channel.description:
it would be nice for everybody to have a player profile, that you can access in game. First of all customizing a player profile is always fun. Secondly here are the benefits viewing a player's profile in game would be helpful:
1. See their amount of games played. This is the biggest reason I want this. Claiming new player shouldn't be a "tactic" for evil king etc. and if somebody appears to be making bad decisions or throwing, being able to see their games played and seeing that they ARE new would prompt you to help them learn instead of getting upset. It's just nice info to know for sure.
2. Customizable "play style" option. Looking for friends to play with that are talkative? quiet and serious? Other play styles that might be similar to yours? Choose your play style or personality or whatever for your profile and check others and find friends that will click with you. (I explained that awful but the idea is nice)
3. If you could get medals from getting positive feedback for being nice or helpful or team oriented etc that would decorate your profile, that is a huge incentive for people to behave nicely in game. Yes that idea was inspired by LoL's positive feedback system but I feel it does work. Or at least doesn't hurt.
Can't think of other things that an in game viewable profile would be good for right this second but i guarantee if you're reading this you can think of some and should comment with your ideas. My big thing is being able to see games played for the reasons I listed.

item.title: In game player profiles
item.dc:creator: livejamie
item.description:
I would assume this is the type of stuff coming as they continue to iterate on the game.

The social stuff is rather bare bones as the company continues to build on the game.

In the future, I’d be interested in knowing my win rate, win rate with certain factions, certain classes. Etc.

Leaderboards would be cool too.

Who’s the best fool, etc.
